definition: The Scanner used to scan microscope images.

description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

image_height.definition: The height of the scanned image.

image_width.definition: The width of the scanned image.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the FilterSet.

name: hardware_scanner

owner.definition: The inventory number of the FilterSet.

scan_mode.definition: The scanning mode e.g. line or xy.

stack_z_step_size.definition: The step size with which the range is scanned.

type.definition: The type of scanner used in a scanning microscope. (e.g. Galvanometer, electro-optic-deflector etc.)
